fields.summary: ResourceManager restart fail to recover due to TimelineServiceV1Publisher NPE

comments.body: This looks like a duplicate of YARN-8068.  Unfortunately that fix should have been committed to branch-2.9 as well but was not. I'll cherry-pick that fix to branch-2 and branch-2.9.
Thanks [~jlowe]. After applying the patch, the problem is solved.
